name: Spooky Mountain
description:
A game about trying to reach a summit.  Made for MiniJam #52, under the constraint that only WASD and/or the arrow keys be used as controls.

(You might need to click the game window to get it to start accepting input.)

External resources used include:

Typewriter font: https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/special-elite

https://freesound.org/people/olver/sounds/130388/
https://freesound.org/people/spiid/sounds/344204/
https://freesound.org/people/Bosk1/sounds/217186/
https://freesound.org/people/Robinhood76/sounds/223470/
